price: Kuma bãbu wata dabba a cikin ƙasa kuma bãbu wani tsuntsu wanda yake tashi da fukafukinsa fãce al'umma ne misãlanku. Ba Mu yi sakacin barin kõme ba a cikin Littãfi, sa'an nan kuma zuwa ga Ubangjinsu ake tãra su.
arabic: وَمَا مِن دَآبَّةٖ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا طَٰٓئِرٖ يَطِيرُ بِجَنَاحَيۡهِ إِلَّآ أُمَمٌ أَمۡثَالُكُمۚ مَّا فَرَّطۡنَا فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مِن شَيۡءٖۚ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ يُحۡشَرُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā min dābbatin fī al-arḍi walā ṭāirin yaṭīru bijanāḥayhi illā umamun amthālukum mā farraṭnā fī al-kitābi min shayin thumma ilā rabbihim yuḥ'sharūna
